subject: Refund the order
description_text:
I accidentally ordered a set of pedals and i didnt mean to, please refund
the purchase immediately. Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Simon Berger,    We apologize, but we have already shipped your order from our German warehouse and are unable to cancel it. We will issue a $20 refund as compensation. Would you like to proceed?

Hi,
Thank you for your reply. I requested the cancellation before the order was
shipped, so I will refuse delivery once it arrives.
Please process a full refund aswell as shipping cost once the package
returns to your warehouse.
I appreciate your understanding.

Kind regards,
Simon Berger


service@simsonn.com

Dear Simonns Team,


I am contacting you regarding my recent order
#SSN2868
which is currently marked as “confirmed” but not shipped. I requested a
cancellation earlier, but my request was refused on the basis that the
order is “already shipping.”


Under EU consumer protection law (Directive 2011/83/EU on consumer rights),
I am exercising my right of withdrawal, which allows me to cancel any
online order within 14 days of receiving the goods — regardless of shipping
status. Since the item has not yet been delivered, my cancellation is fully
valid and must be accepted.


Please confirm the cancellation of my order and issue a full refund to my
original payment method.

If you have already created a shipment label, please note that this does
not void my right of withdrawal unless the item has physically been handed
to the carrier.


Thank you for confirming the cancellation and refund within the next 24
hours.


Kind regards,

Simon Berger

simonbergeer2@gmail.com



service@simsonn.com
